summary: This endpoint initializes a new Vault.

parameters.name: pgp_keys
parameters.description: Specifies an array of PGP public keys used to encrypt the output unseal keys. (base64-encoded).

parameters.name: root_token_pgp_key
parameters.description: Specifies a PGP public key used to encrypt the initial root token. (base64-encoded).

parameters.name: secret_shares
parameters.description: Specifies the number of shares to split the master key into.

parameters.name: secret_threshold
parameters.description: Specifies the number of shares required to reconstruct the master key.
